effect.sun_moon: Exchanges the original Speed stats of the user and target.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Exchanges the original Speed stats of the user and target.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Exchanges the original Speed stats of the user and target.

short_effect.sun_moon: Exchanges the user’s Speed with the target’s.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Exchanges the user’s Speed with the target’s.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Exchanges the user’s Speed with the target’s.
